div.class: uk-grid uk-grid-width-small-1-12 uk-grid-width-medium-1-12 uk-grid-width-large-1-4 uk-margin-medium-top uk-margin-medium-bottom hierarchical_show

div.t-attf-class: {{'uk-progress uk-progress-mini uk-progress-success uk-margin-remove' if sub.attendance_percentage>=76 else 'uk-progress uk-progress-mini uk-progress-danger uk-margin-remove'}}
